name: TheRankTank.com
overview:
TheRankTank.com is where you discover what the very latest best selling products are in the UK.

TheRankTank.com is the first website of its kind which uses actual UK sales data and consumer panels from a wide range of sources including Mintel, Kantar Worldpanel and NPD, to provide a monthly list of best-selling items across a range of everyday categories.

The website focuses on nine products within nine distinct categories each month to include:

  • Sound & Vision
  • Toys & Games
  • Baby & Bump
  • Beauty
  • Computing
  • Entertainment
  • Home & Garden
  • Gifts

TheRankTank.com has a dual functionality as consumers can then purchase their desired product at the lowest price on the web with a simple click of a mouse.

The best selling products are updated monthly and the best prices are updated constantly.
